Reviews.Author: Joseph Hall
Reviews.Content: As a first tablet, or for a child, this is an ok tablet. If you just need something to read on, but you also want to watch Netflix, Youtube, and play some games like Candy Crush, then this should be enough for you. Also, the tablet was rooted by the manufacturer, making it easy to adjust different settings on the tablet and make it load much faster and smoother.However, I prefer computers, and do not like these tablet devices, so I decided to sell mine. However, for a person who wants a basic tablet, that is larger than 7 inches, but smaller than 10 inches, and just wants to try out a cheap yet powerful tablet, then this is the one for you.However, if you are used to Apple's iPads, or any other tablet that costs more than $200, then this tablet will frustrate you with it's many bugs and slowness. However, it is perfect for the new and inexperienced.
Reviews.Title: It's an ok tablet

Reviews.Author: bettinasis
Reviews.Content: I have had this tablet and have been using now for a while (1 month+-) and although it had some quirks in the beginning it is now wonderful. After a couple days use it seemed to 'die', but I hit the tiny reset button and was back in business pronto. I also had some initial issues with wifi reach as I primarily use my device on the second story and my router is on the first floor, but I just move it around a few inches and it kicks back up from 2 to 4 bars which is enough to stream movies from NetFlix, or surf. I found the volume was fine for me without using headphones, but there is a headphone jack and it also came with earplug type headphones (and a micro female to male USB cable for the ability to plug regular USB into your tablet which was nice because if you get a keyboard case they usually just have a reg size USB plug. I liked this one because it has both front & rear cameras and I have used them both and they work well-not a Canon or Nikon but good nonetheless. Also the quad-core and DDR3 RAM which after doing a little research were better to get. I put a 16GB micro SD card in and so far I haven't had any space issues. I read on their website (TURCOM) and they say that the tablet is made in the USA and put together in China? Not sure why but for under $100 this was a good buy and compared to $300 it was a steal.
Reviews.Title: I am happy

Reviews.Author: Tech Teacher
Reviews.Content: I liked the size and idea of this pad for my students. However, when it arrived broken I did not think it would hold up in the hands of high school students. I returned it two days after it arrived.
Reviews.Title: Arrived Broken

Reviews.Author: Humberto Salazar
Reviews.Content: It arrived sooner then expected but the box had some damage and when open the tablet had two scratches and finger prints like some had use it before. When ask for a exchange or refund I was told needed more info(what's so difficult about product not working what else is there to say)  So to any one thinking of purchasing this product wouldn't recommend it save your money cuz I just flushed 110 dollar down the drain.  Thank You  TURCOM for taking my money for a product that doesn't work.
Reviews.Title: Arrived Damage Seems Like It Was Use

Reviews.Author: Martin Schurer "Martin"
Reviews.Content: Hi all,I received my tablet yesterday. Overall I'm very happy with the tablet.Pro:Screen is protected from factory with a thin foil! If the foil is scratched, you can peel it off by put a short tape in a corner and then remove the foil by pulling the tape.The tablet is fast. I played for test templerun 2. It runs very smooth.Con:Poor Wlan range. My old Motorola Defy has connection, but the new tablet not.Color is silver, not blue as described. But this is no real big problem
Reviews.Title: Protective Foil on New Tablet

Reviews.Author: Donna Luzzo
Reviews.Content: Was very disappointed when this tablet arrived.  It had obviously been opened before -- there was a protective plastic sleeve in the box, but the tablet was not in it.  The screen was dirty, and badly scratched.  The product description said the tablet was blue, but the one I received was silver.  Never even got to plug it in  -- so can't comment on how it works.  Hope no one else has this experience.
Reviews.Title: Arrived damaged.

Reviews.Author: Ruben
Reviews.Content: It sucked, screen kept flickering. Completed the restart as the seller suggested but no go. Also if you do a factory reset is initiated, you better know how to read Chinese because all the wording will revert from English to Chinese. It didn't come with blue tooth Very Unstable.
Reviews.Title: Don't buy

Reviews.Author: righturn26
Reviews.Content: I got it as said the right side of screen was dead .  had put a 32 gig SD card in it . it fell in side.  I could not get it out. I told them when I return it I got my $107.00 back but no 32  gig SD card or money back.
Reviews.Title: no 32 gig sd card

Reviews.Author: bobbie jo wenger
Reviews.Content: Ordered the tablet in Aug as a Christmas present for my daughter.  She actually got to use it for a day before the ac adapter port stopped working.  Couldn't get the unit to charge.  Used the usb port to charge so it was no big deal.  The next day the usb port broke inside the tablet.  Called the support number in the box and had to leave a voicemail.  Never got a return call.  Used the amazon "contact seller" function and got a reply email that said it was past the 60 day return policy.  I checked the item when it arrived.  Didn't even turn it on.  It stayed in the box until 12/23 when I charged it before wrapping it.  So I replied to email and explained this.  No return reply.  Called the support number again.  Tried the extensions for customer support, main office, and accounting.  Got the voicemail for all 3, during business hours.  I wouldn't want to answer the phone either with products and service like this.
Reviews.Title: Only thing worse than the tablet is the customer service

Reviews.Author: Chelsea Wilson
Reviews.Content: This tablet is slow to respond.  Asus memo pad much more zippy. If you are on a budget it works ok.  It can be glitchy.  I have had to turn it off and begin again.  Battery about 2-3 hrs.  I use a keyboard which may effect battery life.
Reviews.Title: Slow to respond

Reviews.Author: It's good
Reviews.Content: Maybe a good processor and RAM memory is good.But the design is good, but the screen has an old model and is poorly built. A high-quality screen. The main screen
